name: Woocommerce Product Hover Popup Image
author: Dang Ngoc Binh

sections.description:
This helpful plugin will help you:

  • Show bigger image when customer hover your product image on list
  • Customer will happy because image so good, good feeling

Arbitrary section

You may provide arbitrary sections, in the same format as the ones above. This may be of use for extremely complicated
plugins where more information needs to be conveyed that doesn’t fit into the categories of “description” or
“installation.” Arbitrary sections will be shown below the built-in sections outlined above.

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Some feature
  2. Another feature
  3. Something else about the plugin

Unordered list:

  • something
  • something else
  • third thing

Here’s a link to WordPress and one to Markdown’s Syntax Documentation.
Titles are optional, naturally.

Markdown uses email style notation for blockquotes and I’ve been told:

Asterisks for emphasis. Double it up for strong.

<?php code(); // goes in backticks ?>
sections.installation:
1. Upload hover-popup.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Make sure woocommerce installed and actived
  4. That this!. Browse your product, hover on product image and happy!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload hover-popup.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Make sure woocommerce installed and actived
  4. That this!. Browse your product, hover on product image and happy!

Any question

Please ask question!.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • first version

1.1

  • fix: binding on the fly. Ajax product list will support too!
